info.description:

This is just a glue (technical) module for `product_variant_configurator`
and `website_sale`

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

(after installing both `website_sale` and `product_variant_configurator`)

No configuration is needed, the module should be installed automatically.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/product-variant/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/product-variant/issues/new?body=module:%20product_variant_configurator_website_sale%0Aversion:%2013.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
